data.text: @PerezHilton There is no anger. She just wants t kids to herself. This is learned behvr from her Mom who used her & brother like pawns against her fathet

@HotSouthrnMesss @PerezHilton Well.. From what I heard, he was drinking, smoking but... He went for counseling. I mean who could blame him, dealing w/her! I'm w/you. Let it go & think of the kids & what it's doing to them mentally.  Geez, ppl are ruthless!!

That's probably a subject that she was always concerned about having stabbed Jen in the back. If he did it to Jen whose to say he wouldn't do it to her?she probably snapped
